description: Learn the beautiful French language with an experienced instructor. This class covers speaking, listening, reading, and writing skills. No prior knowledge of French is required.
Join us in this lively Spanish class and immerse yourself in the vibrant culture and language. Develop your conversation skills, vocabulary, and grammar in a friendly environment.

Experience the precision and richness of the German language. This class focuses on building a strong foundation in grammar, vocabulary, and pronunciation. Suitable for beginners and intermediate learners.
Indulge in the beauty of the Italian language. This class offers interactive lessons to help you master Italian grammar, conversation, and culture. All levels are welcome.
Embark on a journey to learn Mandarin Chinese. Our class provides comprehensive instruction in Chinese characters, pronunciation, and conversation. Open to beginners and intermediate learners.
Immerse yourself in the fascinating world of Japanese language and culture. This class focuses on developing your speaking, listening, reading, and writing skills. All levels are welcome.
Discover the beauty of the Arabic language with a skilled instructor. This class covers the Arabic alphabet, grammar, vocabulary, and conversation. Suitable for beginners.
Learn to speak and understand Russian in a fun and engaging environment. This class focuses on practical skills, including grammar, vocabulary, and conversation. All levels are welcome.
Explore the rich culture of Brazil and Portugal through learning Portuguese. This class covers grammar, pronunciation, and conversation. Suitable for beginners and intermediate learners.
Dive into the Korean language and its fascinating culture. This class focuses on practical communication skills, vocabulary building, and Korean script. All levels are welcome.
